headline: Xeris Biopharma (XERS) Surges 14.2%: Is This an Indication of Further Gains?
summary: Xeris Biopharma (XERS) saw its shares surge in the last session with trading volume being higher than average. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions could translate into further price increase in the near term.
